A smart dog leash that tracks your dog's activity and health, providing real-time updates to your phone. It could also include a feature that allows you to remotely reward your dog with treats or play a game of fetch.
A leash with a built-in speaker, allowing you to play music or podcasts while walking your dog, or even take hands-free calls.
A leash with a hidden compartment for storing small items, such as poop bags or treats, for easy access during walks.
A leash that converts into a toy or puzzle for your dog to play with, providing mental stimulation and exercise.
A leash with a built-in cooling or heating system, providing comfort for your dog during hot or cold weather walks.
